title: Colloidal properties and stability of colloidal activated carbon: effects of aqueous chemistry on sedimentation kinetics
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00572D, Paper
Ezinneifechukwunyelu U. Ndubueze, Hardiljeet K. Boparai, Laura Xu, Brent E. Sleep
Recently, in situ injections of polymer-stabilized colloidal activated carbon (CAC) have shown successful immobilization of per/polyfluoroalkyl substances from groundwater.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
